member.name: T:Dalamud.Game.ClientState.ConditionFlag
member.summary:
Possible state flags (or conditions as they're called internally) that can be set on the local client.
These come from LogMessage (somewhere) and directly map to each state field managed by the client. As of 5.25, it maps to LogMessage row 7700 and onwards, which can be checked by looking at the Condition sheet and looking at what column 2 maps to.

member.name: P:Dalamud.Interface.UiBuilder.OnBuildFonts
member.summary:
An event that is called any time ImGui fonts need to be rebuilt.
Any ImFontPtr objects that you store can be invalidated when fonts are rebuilt (at any time), so you should both reload your custom fonts and restore those pointers inside this handler.
PLEASE remove this handler inside Dispose, or when you no longer need your fonts!

Call this to queue a rebuild of the font atlas.

member.name: T:Dalamud.SafeMemory
member.summary: Class facilitating safe memory access
member.remarks: Attention! The performance of these methods is severely worse than regular calls. Please consider using these instead in performance-critical code.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.ReadBytes(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Read a byte array from the current process.
member.param: The amount of bytes to read.
member.returns: Whether or not the read succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.WriteBytes(System.IntPtr,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Write a byte array to the current process.
member.returns: Whether or not the write succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.Read``1(System.IntPtr,``0@)
member.summary: Read an object of the specified struct from the current process.
member.returns: Whether or not the read succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.Read``1(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read an array of objects of the specified struct from the current process.
member.returns: An array of the read objects, or null if any entry of the array failed to read.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.Write``1(System.IntPtr,``0)
member.summary: Write a struct to the current process.
member.returns: Whether or not the write succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.Write``1(System.IntPtr,``0[])
member.summary: Write an array of structs to the current process.
member.returns: Whether or not the write succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.ReadString(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a string from the current process(UTF-8).
member.remarks: Attention! This will use the .NET Encoding.UTF8 class to decode the text. If you read a FFXIV string, please use ReadBytes and parse the string with the applicable class, since Encoding.UTF8 destroys the FFXIV payload structure.
member.param: The maximum length of the string.
member.returns: The read string, or null in case the read was not successful.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.ReadString(System.IntPtr,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a string from the current process(UTF-8).
member.remarks: Attention! This will use the .NET Encoding class to decode the text. If you read a FFXIV string, please use ReadBytes and parse the string with the applicable class, since Encoding may destroy the FFXIV payload structure.
member.param: The encoding to use to decode the string.
The maximum length of the string.
member.returns: The read string, or null in case the read was not successful.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.WriteString(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Write a string to the current process.
member.remarks: Attention! This will use the .NET Encoding class to encode the text. If you read a FFXIV string, please use WriteBytes with the applicable encoded SeString, since Encoding may destroy the FFXIV payload structure.
member.returns: Whether or not the write succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.WriteString(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Write a string to the current process.
member.remarks: Attention! This will use the .NET Encoding class to encode the text. If you read a FFXIV string, please use WriteBytes with the applicable encoded SeString, since Encoding may destroy the FFXIV payload structure.
member.returns: Whether or not the write succeeded.

member.name: M:Dalamud.SafeMemory.SizeOf``1
member.summary: Get the size of the passed type.
member.returns: The size of the passed type.
